title: BBC Local Live: Sheffield and South Yorkshire on Thursday 6 October - BBC News
summary: ben needham search : police switch focus to second site .
park hill renovation plan could take five years .
night of car fires prompts warning from fire service .

documents.title: five things we 've learned today
text: that 's it from me for today , i 'll be back from 08:00 tomorrow with more news , sport , travel and weather .
before i go here are five things we did n't know this morning
we 'll round off with a great photo sent in to us by imari showing a glorious view at totley .
your videos and stories are welcomed and can be sent to us by clicking here .
author: Mick Lunney
BBC Local Live, Sheffield

documents.title: ched evans rape trial : footballer 'could have had any girl '
text: ex-sheffield united footballer ched evans told police he `` could have had any of the girls '' on the night he allegedly raped a woman , a court has heard .
the chesterfield forward denies raping a 19-year-old at a premier inn in rhuddlan , denbighshire , on 30 may 2011 .
cardiff crown court heard the alleged victim arrived `` crying hysterically '' at a friend 's house the next day .
mr evans , 27 , was found guilty of rape at caernarfon crown court in 2012 , but that conviction was quashed in april .

documents.title: weather update : chance of a shower , 11c
text: staying dry for most , but we might get a shower tonight or tomorrow .
author: Mick Lunney
BBC Local Live, Sheffield

documents.title: national award for barnsley fire deaths mum
text: a woman from barnsley whose children were killed in a house fire started by her ex-husband has won a national award .
claire throssell lost her two sons , jack and paul , in the blaze in which the children 's father darren also died .
since then claire has been campaigning for better protection for children in family court cases .
she 's won a `` difference-maker '' award from the national magazine 'red ' and she gave us her reaction :
author: Howard Pressman
Presenter, BBC Radio Sheffield

documents.title: ben needham search : excavations under way at new site
text: police officers , forensic specialists and an archaeologist who have been searching an olive grove next to the farmhouse for the past 11 days have now begun work on a second site , where rubble from the farmhouse was deposited in the days after ben needham 's disappearance .
a bulldozer is being used to clear rubble , trees and other surface debris .
the two sites are less than half a mile apart .

documents.title: fears mount over flood defence plans at sheffield beauty spot
text: concerns have been raised over plans to build flood defences 'taller than three double decker buses ' at a sheffield nature spot .
author: Sheffield Star

documents.title: women of steel poem in full
text: on national poetry day we can bring you the full version of a powerful piece of writing by sheffield poet rachel bower .
it 's called 'women of steel ' and brings the past of sheffield 's women in industry and the present day together in a striking way .
there 's a statue in the city centre erected in honour of the women .
here 's the poem :
author: Mick Lunney
BBC Local Live, Sheffield

documents.title: travel flash : accident on m18 causing long delays
text: the m18 is closed causing severe delays and queuing traffic northbound between junction 1 for bramley and .
j2 for the a1 ( m ) .
it also means congestion on m1 to j33 , a630 ( catcliffe ) and on m1 to j31 , a57 ( sheffield ) .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: ben needham search : second site 'of great significance '
text: police searching for missing toddler ben needham on the greek island of kos have started digging at a second site about half a mile from where he was last seen
det insp jon cousins said the search at the second site was of `` great significance '' and would take four days .

`` it is at a different site to the farmhouse but i understand from what other people are telling me that some material is believed to have been moved from that area and could well be here , '' he said .

documents.title: gun haul seizure by police in south yorkshire
text: seven guns have been seized in an effort to reduce organised crime in south yorkshire .
police say tip-offs from the public have helped and eight people have been arrested .

we have a dedicated team established to explore every line of inquiry and piece of information we receive about gangs and firearms in a bid to better understand how organised criminals work and how we can best disrupt their activity . ''
author: Mick Lunney
BBC Local Live, Sheffield

documents.title: the nightmare of losing a child - screening of documentary in sheffield
text: it 's hard to imagine anything worse for a parent than losing a child .
each year in the uk more than 5,000 parents leave hospital without the baby they 'd been hoping to nurture .
there 's a new documentary being shown at the showroom in sheffield exploring what life is like after losing a baby .
it 's called still loved ' .
here 's a clip .
author: Paulette Edwards
Presenter, BBC Radio Sheffield

documents.title: video : police on kos search second site for ben needham
text: the bbc 's tom ingall is watching the search for ben needham at a second location linked to his disappearance 25 years ago .
the latest from # kos as # benneedham police move rocks and prepare to search site 2 .
@ twitterid @ twitterid
author: Tom Ingall
Journalist, BBC Look North

documents.title: meningitis warning from teen who nearly died
text: teenager charlene colechin is recovering in a sheffiled hospital after almost losing her life to meningitis .
the 18-year-old , from near chesterfield in derbyshire , wants like this one to raise awareness of the dangers posed by the disease .
she does n't yet know if her feet can be saved and only surgery will reveal that .
i was in a coma for nine days because all my organs were failing .
i did die but obviously they brought me back . ''
author: Gina Bolton
BBC Radio Sheffield

documents.title: 'do n't panic ' message from rotherham united 's manager
text: you can hear tony stewart talking to bbc radio sheffield about rotherham united 's performance and fortunes , along with his `` stay calm '' message to fans and players :
listen : # rufc chairman tony stewart : `` the signs of improvement are there .
there 's no need to panic . ''
@ twitterid let 's get him back on the show in april and see if he was correct .
author: Andy Giddings
Sports Editor, BBC Sheffield

documents.title: armed police in street operation in sheffield
text: police officers making an arrest in sheffield called for back-up when a man was reportedly spotted with a gun .
author: Sheffield Star

documents.title: five-year scheme to finish listed flats
text: five-year scheme to finish listed flats

documents.title: watch : police search new site 'for material which may have been moved '
text: a second site containing 20 piles of rubble is now being searched on the island of kos .
police have been working near a farmhouse , part of which was demolished yesterday , in their search for clues over the 25-year-old mystery about ben 's fate .
he vanished when out playing as his family renovated a farm building .
today police have explaining why they 're at a second site for their search :
author: Tom Ingall
Journalist, BBC Look North

documents.title: national poetry day big style
text: it should be writ large
well that 's very much the case for this piece on the side of the hallam university media centre building sheffield .
it 's being highlighted by the city council to prompt people to share their favourite poems on national poetry day .
on # nationalpoetryday what is your favourite sheffield verse ?
we think it 's hard to beat andrew motion on the @ twitterid building .
author: Rony Robinson
Presenter, BBC Radio Sheffield

documents.title: striking morning sunshine today
text: thanks to weather watcher dotty in thorne for this striking image .
you can send your videos and stories to us here , we 'd love to see them .
author: Mick Lunney
BBC Local Live, Sheffield

documents.title: fire service warning after six cars torched in one night
text: half a dozen vehicle fires in quick succession , all blamed on arsonists , have left fire crews in south yorkshire frustrated .
last night they were called to locations in sheffield , rotherham and doncaster .
incidents such as these take up a large amount of our resources when they could be needed at genuine life-threatening emergencies . ''
author: Mick Lunney
BBC Local Live, Sheffield

documents.title: ben needham search : police examine new site
text: detectives searching for missing toddler ben needham on kos are examining a new site on the greek island .
piles of rubble are to be sifted at a second search site in the hunt for clues as to what happened to ben 25 years ago .
police have been searching land next to a farmhouse for almost two weeks , including demolishing part of a farmhouse .
today they 're exploring another piece of land .
this rubble material is connected to individuals who 'd been working on the farmhouse , it 'll take four or five days to sift through . ''
there are 20 piles of rubble to clear on this site .
it 's been surveyed using ground penetrating radar .
@ twitterid
author: Tom Ingall
Journalist, BBC Look North

documents.title: local golfers in action at st andrews today
text: sheffield 's matthew fitzpatrick , danny willett and lee westwood all take part in the alfred dunhill links championship which begins today at st andrews .
fitzpatrick tells us it 's a chance to put behind him the disappointment of failing to score a single point at the ryder cup :
author: Rob Staton
BBC Radio Sheffield

documents.title: teenager stable as two arrested over park 'attack ' .
text: a seventeen-year-old remains in hospital today after being seriously injured in queen 's park , chesterfield yesterday .
an 18-year-old man and a 17-year-old youth , both from chesterfield , were arrested later in the evening on sus of causing grievous bodily harm .
author: Mick Lunney
BBC Local Live, Sheffield

documents.title: watch : think we 're gon na dance now for cin
text: some of the team at bbc radio sheffield are mad keen to throw some shapes for pudsey next month .
we 've put together a special event for children in need which features jive bunny .
back to the 80s for pudsey takes place at the leadmill in sheffield .
as part of the fun we 'll see some corking choreography from our lot to wham 's 'wake me up before you go-go .
join us on friday 4 november .
doors open at 1900 for a 19:30 start .
there 's a bit of work to do for some
author: Oli Constable

documents.title: international football fixtures tonight and local players
text: barnsley 's tom bradshaw and adam davies are on stand-by to play for wales in tonight 's world cup qualifier against austria .
meanwhile , a thigh injury has ruled sheffield wednesday goalkeeper keiran westwood out of the republic of ireland 's game against georgia .
author: Andy Giddings
Sports Editor, BBC Sheffield

documents.title: ben needham search to cover a new site on kos
text: we 'll bring you updates across the day on the search for ben needham .
look north 's tom ingall is following the search and he 's keeping us up-to-date .
day 11 of operation ben on kos .
police will take the press to the second site today where preparatory work is underway .
@ twitterid
this no longer seems focussed & confident .
author: Tom Ingall
Journalist, BBC Look North

documents.title: new plan to finish major city flats project in sheffield
text: one of the biggest landmarks in sheffield is in the news this morning .
park hill flats ' developers say they can finish the refurbishment work .
its been going on for nearly ten years .
the company urban splash say there 's a revised deal with the council to get the job finished in five years time .
they 're splitting the rest of the work into four new phases , starting with 210 more residential properties and then creating 330 student housing units .
here 's a look at park hill 'then ' and 'now ' :
author: James Vincent
Reporter BBC Look North

documents.title: weather for the day ahead in video
text: feeling a touch cooler but dry , 15c .
owain has the full

Weather presenter, BBC Look North

documents.title: good morning
text: welcome to your news , sport , weather and travel news for south yorkshire this thursday .
it 's national poetry day and we 've got to kick off with a powerful piece written especially for bbc radio sheffield about the women of steel .
this is the abridged version of 'women of steel ' by rachel bower :

Presenter, BBC Radio Sheffield
